datoCmsKey.name: Kai Alexander Judd
datoCmsKey.locations: Minneapolis / St. Paul| New York City| San Francisco / Oakland
datoCmsKey.bio:
Trans, hapa actor, set to graduate with a BFA in Music Theatre from Viterbo University May 2020. CA grown, NY bound!
I want to put my heart and soul into tales of intersectional liberation onstage. I also wanna take the existing canon and bring new depth to familiar characters. Mostly just looking to collaborate with folx of all kinds, run around, and sing.
